# SubscriptionGracePeriodDuration | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ SubscriptionGracePeriodDuration ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/SubscriptionGracePeriodDuration)

-  SubscriptionGracePeriodDuration 

Type# SubscriptionGracePeriodDuration

App Store Connect API 2.2+

```
string SubscriptionGracePeriodDuration
```

## [ Possible Values ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/SubscriptionGracePeriodDuration#possibleValues)

`THREE_DAYS``SIXTEEN_DAYS``TWENTY_EIGHT_DAYS`## [Possible values](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/SubscriptionGracePeriodDuration#Possible-values)

`THREE_DAYS`A string that represents 3 days.

`SIXTEEN_DAYS`A string that represents 16 days.

`TWENTY_EIGHT_DAYS`A string that represents 28 days.
